descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Survivors of Xcalibur is the first made-for-VR bullet heaven/auto shooter/survivor-like game.                                                                                                           

   [media]

**Full control**

Take matters in your own hands (literally) and defend against unrelenting hordes of enemies. Your character is like a toy in your hands - you can move it in full 3D weaving and waving between enemies with a deadly grace.

**Defend and Survive**

Your task is to protect Purification Crystals cleansing the world from eons-long curse.  They will be relentlessly attacked by hordes of enemies so you have to care both about your own life and the crystals themselves. Don’t worry though, you’ll be granted a whole arsenal to do it.

**Power Up**

If you ever want to succeed you’ll have to grow stronger and bolster defenses of the crystals. With each survived second you’ll gain more power that will allow you to unlock new weapons, items and defensive gear for your citadel.

**Decide**

You’ll always have more gear than you can take with you on the battlefield so choose wisely. Create your own play style by choosing proper equipment. Test your strategy, rebuild, adapt and conquer.

[media]
**Early Access**

What you see in this game now is just a taste of what it can become. We’re releasing in Early Access to gather Your feedback and thoughts. If you like what you see, can feel the potential of Xcalibur - let us know. We can make this game great together!

**Full control**

Take matters in your own hands (literally) and defend against unrelenting hordes of enemies. Your character is like a toy in your hands - you can move it in full 3D weaving and waving between enemies with a deadly grace.

**Defend and Survive**

Your task is to protect Purification Crystals cleansing the world from eons-long curse.  They will be relentlessly attacked by hordes of enemies so you have to care both about your own life and the crystals themselves. Don’t worry though, you’ll be granted a whole arsenal to do it.

**Power Up**

If you ever want to succeed you’ll have to grow stronger and bolster defenses of the crystals. With each survived second you’ll gain more power that will allow you to unlock new weapons, items and defensive gear for your citadel.

**Decide**

You’ll always have more gear than you can take with you on the battlefield so choose wisely. Create your own play style by choosing proper equipment. Test your strategy, rebuild, adapt and conquer.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473391713_873981148128423_1377307487536381754_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=FwX2WTqgnTkQ7kNvwEnYjKL&_nc_oc=AdmjucEFBjAqjLKBdQaoSZ26jFitojrC8QDjO82ZDgkGMrSTJxQjb5ihkqMPcpB-GlA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=fLtkr5Me8JQbykCUngEpvw&oh=00_Afs72w8jmfnBepnfJC-BhtRUB8mprr9USgel0DrR_eGUZw&oe=6994C010)
**Early Access**

What you see in this game now is just a taste of what it can become. We’re releasing in Early Access to gather Your feedback and thoughts. If you like what you see, can feel the potential of Xcalibur - let us know. We can make this game great together!
